description: My goal with this project was to see how close I could get to the 2015 Hubble shot celebrating 25 years in orbit... Hubble Pillars of Creation Fortunately my Ha, OIII and SII filters are very close to those used by Hubble... Blue: F502N (OIII) Green: F657N (HÎ± + NII) Red: F673N (SII) ... so similar color was in sight. (-: The biggest challenge was to capture good Ha for detail. This uses 35 of my best 5-minute Ha exposures over several days. FWHM on Ha subs is between 1.7" and 2.1". After combining SII, OIII and Ha, uncolored Ha was added as a soft light layer to help with detail and contrast. Minor noise reduction was applied to SII and OIII. No noise reduction on Ha to help maximize detail. Finally, a very mild Unsharp Mask was applied over a cropped 2X Drizzle for additional detail.
title: The Pillars of Creation with 24"
